trait.name: Humanoid Swarm
entries: As a group of humanoids, the swarm has the following effects:

items: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the swarm is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the swarm is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the swarm is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet that shares a tag (other than Swarm) with the swarm can use its action to merge into the swarm, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR.

trait.name: Lines and Squares
entries: The phalanx can use half its movement to reshape itself from a 10-foot square into a 20-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line or vice versa.

trait.name: Hold the Line
entries: Creatures smaller than the phalanx cannot enter its space unless it lets them or a magic effect specifically allows them to. A creature can attempt to force its way in using a {@action Shove} action. The phalanx has advantage on the contested check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Phalanx makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) piercing damage or {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage if the phalanx is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Slings
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) piercing damage or {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage if the phalanx is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

reaction.name: Pike Wall
entries: When a creature moves into the reach of the phalanx's Pike attack, the phalanx can use a reaction to make a Pike attack against that creature. If the creature is Large or larger, the phalanx has advantage on this attack.

variant.name: Variant Humanoid Swarms
entries: At the DM's discretion, a swarm may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The swarm knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the swarm has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the swarm's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The swarm can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The swarm can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The swarm has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The swarm has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The swarm has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The swarm is composed of at least some Large creatures. The swarm's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The swarm has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Small
entries: The swarm is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

trait.name: Humanoid Swarm
entries: As a group of humanoids, the swarm has the following effects:

items: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the swarm is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the swarm is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the swarm is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet that shares a tag (other than Swarm) with the swarm can use its action to merge into the swarm, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Phalanx makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}53 ({@damage 10d10 + 8}) piercing damage or {@h}31 ({@damage 5d10 + 8}) piercing damage if the phalanx is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Slings
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}39 ({@damage 10d6 + 4}) piercing damage or {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) piercing damage if the phalanx is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

reaction.name: Pike Wall
entries: When a creature moves into the reach of the phalanx's Pike attack, the phalanx can use a reaction to make a Pike attack against that creature. If the creature is Large or larger, the phalanx has advantage on this attack.

entries: At the DM's discretion, a swarm may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Breath Weapon

A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The swarm has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The swarm has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The swarm has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The swarm is composed of at least some Large creatures. The swarm's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The swarm has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Small
entries: The swarm is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

trait.name: Humanoid Swarm
entries: As a group of humanoids, the swarm has the following effects:

items: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the swarm is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the swarm is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the swarm is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet that shares a tag (other than Swarm) with the swarm can use its action to merge into the swarm, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR.

trait.name: Crew the Ship
entries: When the crew uses its action to act as the crew of a ship, it counts as a number of crew equal to 20% of its current hit points (rounded down, minimum of 1).

action.name: Knives and Axes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) bludgeoning or slashing damage or {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) bludgeoning or slashing damage if the ship crew is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Volley
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage or {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage if the ship crew is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Grappling Hooks (3/Day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one Large or larger object. {@h}The object is pulled 10 feet towards the ship crew.

variant.name: Variant: Crew Actions vs Ship Actions
entries: The current version of this statblock assumes a ruleset in which the ship itself has actions and the crew simply contribute to those actions by numbers alone. If you are not using such a ruleset or the ship does not use its own actions, such as spelljammers, you may wish with to replace the Crew the Ship trait with the folllowing:

entries.name: Crew Actions
entries: While on board a ship they control, the ship crew takes one of the following actions:

items.name: Move
entries: The ship moves up to 20 feet, or 10 feet if the ship crew has half of its hit points or fewer.

items.name: Fire
entries: The ship crew loads, aims and fires a weapon mounted on the vehicle. The attack deals an additional {@dice 1d10} damage if the ship crew has more than half its hit points.

items.name: Repair
entries: The ship crew touches a component or weapon of the vehicle and restores 10 hit points it, or 5 hit points if the ship crew has half of its hit points or fewer.

items.name: Brace
entries: The crew protects a itself, a creature, or a component or weapon on the ship within 5 feet. Attacks against the target have disadvantage.

variant.name: Variant Humanoid Swarms
entries: At the DM's discretion, a swarm may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

action.name: Knives and Axes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}48 ({@damage 8d10 + 4}) bludgeoning or slashing damage or {@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) bludgeoning or slashing damage if the ship crew is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Volley
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 8d6 + 2}) piercing damage or {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) piercing damage if the ship crew is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Grappling Hooks (3/Day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one Large or larger object. {@h}The object is pulled 25 feet towards the ship crew.

variant.name: Variant: Crew Actions vs Ship Actions
entries: The current version of this statblock assumes a ruleset in which the ship itself has actions and the crew simply contribute to those actions by numbers alone. If you are not using such a ruleset or the ship does not use its own actions, such as spelljammers, you may wish with to replace the Crew the Ship trait with the folllowing:

entries.name: Crew Actions
entries: While on board a ship they control, the ship crew takes one of the following actions:

items.name: Move
entries: The ship moves up to 50 feet, or 25 feet if the ship crew has half of its hit points or fewer.

items.name: Fire
entries: The ship crew loads, aims and fires a weapon mounted on the vehicle. The attack deals an additional {@dice 4d10} damage if the ship crew has more than half its hit points.

items.name: Repair
entries: The ship crew touches a component or weapon of the vehicle and restores 40 hit points it, or 20 hit points if the ship crew has half of its hit points or fewer.

items.name: Brace
entries: The crew protects a itself, a creature, or a component or weapon on the ship within 5 feet. Attacks against the target have disadvantage.

variant.name: Variant Humanoid Swarms
entries: At the DM's discretion, a swarm may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The swarm knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the swarm has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the swarm's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The swarm can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The swarm can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The swarm has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The swarm has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The swarm has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The swarm is composed of at least some Large creatures. The swarm's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The swarm has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Small
entries: The swarm is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

trait.name: Humanoid Swarm
entries: As a group of humanoids, the swarm has the following effects:

items: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the swarm is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the swarm is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the swarm is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet that shares a tag (other than Swarm) with the swarm can use its action to merge into the swarm, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mob makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Shivs and Stools
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) bludgeoning or slashing damage or {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning or slashing damage if the mob is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Bottles and Bricks
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) bludgeoning or slashing damage or {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning or slashing damage if the mob is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

bonus.name: Rip and Tear
entries: A creature in the mob's space starts {@condition bleeding|J:general}.

bonus.name: Reckless Indulgence
entries: Influenced by powerful substances or emotions, the mob's attack rolls have advantage until the start of its next turn. Attacks rolls against the mob have advantage for the same duration.

variant.name: Variant Humanoid Swarms
entries: At the DM's discretion, a swarm may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The swarm knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the swarm has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the swarm's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warband makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Spears and Axes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) slashing or piercing damage or {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing or piercing damage if the warband is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Barrage
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing or piercing damage or {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing or piercing damage if the warband is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Battlecry (3/Day)
entries: The warband lets out a terrifying scream. Up to PB creatures of the warband's choice that it can see within 30 feet and that can hear the warband must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + Charisma modifier) or become {@condition frightened|XPHB} by the warband for one minute (save ends).

reaction.name: We are coming for you!
entries: When a creature the warband can see within 60 feet ends its turn {@condition frightened|XPHB} of it, the warband can move up to half its speed towards the creature.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}52 ({@damage 10d8 + 7}) slashing or piercing damage or {@h}30 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) slashing or piercing damage if the warband is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Barrage
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}42 ({@damage 10d6 + 7}) slashing or piercing damage or {@h}35 ({@damage 8d6 + 7}) slashing or piercing damage if the warband is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Battlecry (3/Day)
entries: The warband lets out a terrifying scream. Up to PB creatures of the warband's choice that it can see within 30 feet and that can hear the warband must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + Charisma modifier) or become {@condition frightened|XPHB} by the warband for one minute (save ends).

reaction.name: We are coming for you!
entries: When a creature the warband can see within 60 feet ends its turn {@condition frightened|XPHB} of it, the warband can move up to half its speed towards the creature.

variant.name: Variant Humanoid Swarms
entries: At the DM's discretion, a swarm may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The swarm knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the swarm has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the swarm's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The swarm can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The swarm can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The swarm has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The swarm has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The swarm has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The swarm is composed of at least some Large creatures. The swarm's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The swarm has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Small
entries: The swarm is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.
